Caption.String: In Value mode, SAM applies both inflation and escalation to the first year cost to calculate out-year costs. In Schedule mode, neither inflation nor escalation applies. See Help for details.

Description.String: Type a fixed battery O&M cost ($/kW) for each year. SAM does not apply inflation or escalation to the values you specify.
Type a fixed battery O&M cost ($) for each year. SAM does not apply inflation or escalation to the values you specify.
Type a battery replacement cost in $ per kWh of battery capacity for each year.
Type a variable O&M cost ($/kWh) for each year. SAM does not apply inflation or escalation to the values you specify.
Type a fixed PV O&M cost ($/kW) for each year. SAM does not apply inflation or escalation to the values you specify.
Type a fixed PV O&M cost ($) for each year. SAM does not apply inflation or escalation to the values you specify.
Type a variable O&M cost ($/kWh) for each year. SAM does not apply inflation or escalation to the values you specify.
